Abandoned

https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/64785

```
HeaderFilterRegex: '(?!^subprojects).*'
```

We need to add this so that files from subprojects do not get included in clang-tidy when ran outside of the CI scripts.
Thank You, Patrick. Included in this chain-  https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/64785.
@Pavithra - I think this needs a bit more documentation on what sort of errors were being fixed, its not completely implicit from the code that the changes you made are just for fixing clang errors.

Sure I can update the commit message. All these errors were clang-diagnostics errors and were not related to any clang-tidy checks.
Should I paste all those errors I got ?
I would suggest fixing the issues in commits separately from the add of the .clang-tidy.

Sure Patrick, created seperate commits for the issues.
Commit chain - https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/64789/3
why it it unmoved ?

`std::move` was just an extra thing of copying we were doing here.
The error was - `moving a temporary object prevents copy elision [clang-diagnostic-pessimizing-move]`
eid & fd are being sent earlier ? what clang error are you getting here ?

yes, mctp_eid is still used, but mctp_fd is not used here anywhere in the code. it's just initialized.
Clang-error was - mctp_fd not used [unused parameter]
The new commit chain is - https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/64789/3
I will abandon this commit as I have created a new commit chain addressing the review comments - https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/64789/3
